715926f-a.title: Manhattan: Allen Street - Broome Street
715926f-a.text:
96-92 Allen Street, east side, between Broome and Delancey Streets.
June 21, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

715924f-b.title: Manhattan: Allen Street - Broome Street
715924f-b.text:
Allon Street, north frorm Broome Street, showing
demolition on the easterly side, preparatory to the widen-
ihng of this thoroughfare. Delancey Street is in the center
and the photographer is viewing towards same.
September 30, 1931
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr
715924f-b.folder: Allen Street & Broome Street, Manhattan, NY

717860f-a.title: Manhattan: Broome Street - Allen Street
717860f-a.text:
Broome Street, south side, east from Allen Street.
June 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
